text: Tait may refer to: * Tait (band), an American Christian rock band formed by Michael Tait * Tait (train), a type of train that operated in and near Melbourne, Australia * Tait or Honey possum, a small marsupial (mammal) of Australia * Tait Communications, a radio communications company * Tait Glacier, a glacier on James Ross Island, Antarctica * Tait River, a river in Minnesota, United States ==People== *Tait (surname), a surname (including a list of people with the surname) ===People with the given name=== * Tait Fletcher, American mixed martial artist ==See also== * * Tate (disambiguation)
title: Tait
